Background

Discovered on 30 October 1976 by David Noble, Keith Maxwell and Rose Adams while exploring tributaries of Annie Rowan Creek. Named Disappointment Canyon because of the spectacular start, but soon ending when it joined another branch. Photos from the first descent can be seen on this page: http://www.david-noble.net/canyoning/wolgan/wolgancanyons.html
